ower jack, Micro USB port, Mini HDMI Interface ¡¡ Webcam Pre 0.3 MP, rear 2.0 MP ¡¡ Recording Microphone ¡¡ Headphone 3.5mm stereo headset ¡¡ Speaker (Speaker) 1 Watt, 8 Ohm X2 ¡¡ USB USB2.0 ports: Support OTG function (available for pick Host master keyboard, mouse, U disk, 3G, Ethernet modules, etc., can also be when the Device from the device) ¡¡ WIFI Support IEEE 802.11b/g/n Transfer Protocol ¡¡ Gravity sensor G-Sensor Supports 3-axis accelerometer game ¡¡ Video
